Well, I must say thank you for helping me get through to my associates this past spring (Computer Science). My bachelors isn’t gonna be any easier, but I was determined to get through my associates program, I can make it through this one too.

Our schools used to do Khan academy, but then in 6th grade we started using a crap program called i-ready. Ugh. I hate it so much. They try to teach you using dumb cartoon characters and claim its "fun" and it "works" but no. Their lessons make no sense  (Even though I get A+'s in math) and are so freaking cringey. Although we use i-ready now, I still use Khan Academy on my own at home and I love it! Khan academy is helping me understand things i'm not so sure about and I am also learning things above my grade level. Congratulations on 10 years! and screw i-ready
